column4: i cant get my ipod 3rd gen to mount on desktop, amarok to open, or get my bookmark links to open in konqueror
PLEASE HELP?!
you have 3 problems. :)
the ipod thing...it's a 3rd gen? does it work with another computer?
Hmm. do me a favor. unplug it.
start up a terrminal
let me know when you get to that point
just ipod
type "dmesg"
i: and don't paste anything. just note that last line
hit enter
just note the last line--just remember what it is
the last line was: [21024.312000]usb 1-2: USB disconnect, address 4
that's GOOD news.
okay. Now, plug in your ipod and type "dmesg" again and hit enter
any luck?
the last line of most recent command you gave was: [21439.132000] sd 5:0:0:0: Attached scsigeneric sg4 type 0
looks like it found your ipod
try starting rhythmbox
it may not automount. but it's certainly found the disk
I need to go. but your system is seeing the ipod.
np. Hope someone else can help
Applicatiosn Menu -> Sound and Video
